title: Christian Hosoi & Penny Skateboards go to Carlsbad, CA.
description: We loaded up the Penny truck with Penny 22” and 27” skateboards, shirts, hats and other prizes and made our way through the heart of Carlsbad to the Sun Diego store. Just one block from the beach, it was the perfect location to put on a Bull Taco lunch, Penny games and the chance for locals to meet Christian Hosoi.

asset.title: Christian Hosoi & Penny Skateboards go to Carlsbad, CA.
